explanation: [0-0] A man and a boy are standing on a tiled sidewalk next to a pink wall. The man, wearing a white shalwar kameez and a blue turban, is looking at his phone. The boy, with his left hand on the wall, is wearing a brown turban, a brown shalwar kameez, and carrying a yellow bag. There is a black water pipe in front of them, and a puddle of water and mud on the ground ahead.

[0-8] The man, playing with his phone, walks to the right with the boy. The man steps on the mud, slips, and falls to the ground. After getting up, the man looks at the mud on his body, waves his hands up and down, and walks off to the right.
